item.description: / Breezy is a pneumatic experiment designed to help people with scars to care for their neck health and ear health. Finished during 1 month of teaching assistant period in Tongji Fablab O, Shanghai, China. / “ Scar is your breathing beauty.” / Year: 2020 Watch the prototype video here: https://vimeo.com/579725521
/ Here are the on-going experienments of pattern generating by grasshopper and sketches, which i am currently interested in. / Year: 2021 -

/ This conceptual project was completed during DigitalFutures workshop – Soft Touch, instructed by professor Sofia Guridi and Emmi Pouta from Aalto University in Finland. The workshop aimed at combining electronic components with flexible textile materials to obtain some further product solutions or concepts. / North pole is shifting. According to researchers, due to the severe climate change, the pole has been moving steadily eastward by about 75 degrees, heading toward the Prime Meridian that runs through Greenwich, England.
